title: Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area
name: Satwiwa Cultural Center
directions: Take Wendy Drive 2.5 miles south from US Route 101 to Potrero Road
hours: 9AM-5PM. Cultural Center open Sat. and Sun. only
content: Satwiwa Native American Indian Cultural Center provides public exhibits and education regarding local Tongva/Gabrielino cultures. This site is a starting point for trails to Boney Peak and Big Sycamore Canyon/Beach.
